# üîí Secure Deployment Guide for NYU PhD Career Advisor

## üöÄ **Option 1: Secure Deployment with Streamlit Secrets (Recommended)**

### **Step 1: Prepare Your Repository**

Your repository should have this structure:
```
your-repo/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ app1.py
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ requirements.txt
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ .gitignore
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md
```

**‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT**: Do NOT include the `data/` folder in your repository for secure deployment.

### **Step 2: Configure Streamlit Secrets**

After deploying to Streamlit Cloud, go to your app settings and add the following secrets:

#### **API Keys Section:**
```toml
[api_keys]
openai_key = "your-openai-api-key"
adzuna_app_id = "your-adzuna-app-id"
adzuna_app_key = "your-adzuna-app-key"
```

#### **Data Files Section:**
```toml
[data_files]
nyu_data = "
